body: Your heavenly light can be used in a variety of ways.
name: Heavenly Radiance
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/New Racial Rules/Aasimar Feats/Heavenly Radiance

sections.body: Aasimar, daylight spell-like ability, sufficiently high level (see below).
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain one additional use per day of daylight. Choose one spell from the table below; by expending a use of daylight, you may use this spell as a spell-like ability. To select a spell, you must meet the minimum character level for its listing in the table. The save DC for this spell is Charisma-based.

Spell-Like AbilityMinimum Character Level
Flare burst1st
Wake of light3rd
Searing light5th
Wandering star motes7th
Sunbeam (one beam only)9th
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/New Racial Rules/Aasimar Feats/Heavenly Radiance/Benefit/Spell-Like Ability
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability
Benefit

sections.body: You may take this feat multiple times. Each time you select it, you gain an additional use of daylight and may select another spell from the table.
sections.name: Special
